content:
Set Up Knowledge Component Actions

Use Knowledge component actions to share article contents or links from your Salesforce and Experience Cloud sites.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Salesforce Classic (not available in all orgs) and Lightning Experience

Salesforce Knowledge is available in Essentials and Unlimited Editions with Service Cloud. It's also available for an additional cost in Professional, Enterprise, Performance, and Developer Editions.

Set Up Actions to Insert Articles into Channels in Lightning Knowledge

Agents can embed article content into emails and social conversations using the Lightning Knowledge component. Create a communication channel mapping to choose which article fields are included for each record type and channel.

Set Up Actions to Insert Articles to Case Publishers in Salesforce Classic

Agents can send articles' content embedded in emails and social posts using Knowledge in Salesforce Classic. Create a communication channel mapping to choose which article fields are included for each article type.

Set Up Actions to Share Article URLs in Channels and Case Publishers

Agents can insert links to articles into case feeds and share them in email, social, and Experience Cloud publishers.

SEE ALSO
Send an Article PDF (Classic)

Let us know if this article solved your issue.
title: Setting Up Knowledge Component Actions in Service Cloud
